item.description:
Rock and Blues Benefit Festival

Sat, Oct 13, 2012 ~ Gate 11 AM, Shows 12-6PM

A Rain or Shine Benefit to Help Save
The Bolton Fair & Their Fairgrounds

6 Bands & Firefly's Bodacious Bar-B-Que

05:00 PM ~ The Bruce Marshall Group
04:00 PM ~ James Montgomery Blues Band
03:00 PM ~ Eastwood Peak
02:00 PM ~ The Chris Fitz Band
01:00 PM ~ Butch Bazillion & Lost
12:00 PM ~ Marty Beecy & The Rogue Loons

Fairgrounds at Lancaster (Bolton Fair)
318 Seven Bridge Road (Rte 117)
Lancaster, MA 01523

TICKETS ~ RAIN OR SHINE EVENT
$20 in Advance or $25 at the Gate

More information and tickets can be found here:
http://www.musicfest.boltonfair.org

Presented by The Bolton Fair, Inc. and
Richard Axtman ~ Northern Music
northernmusic@yahoo.com
http://www.myspace.com/northernmusicagency
http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100001577514520
item.name: Help Save The Bolton Fair ~ Rock and Blues Benefit Festival
